name: grey
description:
In this game there is a house that is filled with monsters from portals and destroy furniture. You don't want to give your house to them to be torn to pieces, so you turn on the vacuum cleaner and go to win back the space)

1. To start the game, click on the vacuum cleaner in the lower left corner.


2. When the animation starts, select the wave in the upper-right corner. 0 is the shutdown of monsters, and 1, 2, 3 and 4 are the speed of their appearance.


3. Now monsters walk on the floors! Click on them with the cursor to pick them up, and transfer them to the capsules in the lower right corner.


4. If the capsules run out of space, restart them.


Have a nice game!
